name: Protective Lip Treatment
about: What it is:A sunscreen for lips utilizing adaptable inner-shield technology that supports skinu2019s natural protective abilities..Skin Type:Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Improves Supports blood oxygen saturation..What Else You Need to Know:This lip treatment provides effective protection from the sunu2019s damaging rays and selectively allows the latent benefits of red light in sunlight to be passed through to the skin. With reapplication, the velvety-smooth melting texture replenishes the lips with up to 24 hours of hydration.
ingredients: - Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Supports blood oxygen saturation..- Argania Spinosau200b Kernel Oil Extract: Protects the stratum corneum of the lips..- Potentilla Erecta Root Extract: Targets enzyme activity responsible for collagen..-Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Improves blood oxygen saturation..-Argania Spinosau200b Kernel Oil Extract: Protects the stratum corneum of the lips..-Potentilla Erecta Root Extract: Inhibits enzyme activity responsible for collagen...Avobenzoneu20022.3%, Homosalateu200210.0%, Octisalateu20025.0%, Octocryleneu20025.0%.Inactive Ingredients: Water,Butylene Glycol,Glycerin,Silica,Glycerylu2002Diisostearate,Alcoholu2002Denat.,Caprylyl Methicone,Behenyl Alcohol,C30-45u2002Alkyl Methicone,Dipropyleneu2002Glycol,Dimethicone,Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Beheneth-25u2002Methacrylateu2002Crosspolymer,Xanthan Gum,Trehalose,Tocopherylu2002Acetate,2-O-Ethyl Ascorbicu2002Acid,Scutellariau2002Baicalensis Root Extract,Glycine,Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether,Thymusu2002Serpyllumu2002Extract,Garcinia Mangostanau2002Barku2002Extract,Panaxu2002Ginseng Root Extract,Fagusu2002Sylvaticau2002Bud Extract,Aminoethanesulfinic Acid,Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract,Angelicau2002Acutiloba Root Extract,Hydrolyzedu2002Conchiolin Protein,Hydrolyzedu2002Silk,Perilla Ocymoidesu2002Leaf Extract,Polyquaternium-51,Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract,Saxifragau2002Sarmentosau2002Extract,Ginkgou2002Biloba Leaf Extract,Menthau2002Piperitau2002(Peppermint)u2002Leafu2002Extract,Beheneth-20,C30-45u2002Olefin,Stearyl Alcohol,Disodium Edta,Carbomer,Potassiumu2002Hydroxide,Tocopherol,Sodium Metaphosphate,Bht,Alcohol,Sodiumu2002Metabisulfite,Theanine,Syzygium Jambos Leafu2002Extract,Phenoxyethanol,Fragrance,Ironu2002Oxides,Titanium Dioxide,Mica.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swivel up the bullet and apply to lips. Reapply throughout the day as needed.u200b.-May also be applied slightly beyond the lip contour to create a more defined lip look.

reviews.review_title: Had high hopes but itu2019s just ok
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of the balm is nice: not sticky or strongly scented. But it doesnu2019t have a lasting effect. It dries my lips and I need to reapply frequently. The cap falls off too easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pricey. The cap is very light and flimsy. It is not worth this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy occasional splurges, and this was my treat to myself. There arenu2019t enough lip products out there with SPF, so I wanted to try this one out. Right away I was disappointed in the packaging. It feels light and flimsy. The product was better, with a pleasant floral scent and nice texture, but at 4grams, itu2019s very pricey. Iu2019ll use it up but wonu2019t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After I receive it , I tried put together , when I pull the lid off the lip cream. Broken in pieces.. very disappointing
